abilities.name: Gunk
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit cant move.

abilities.name: Leadership
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [Keyword1] ability.

abilities.name: Bolstered Defence
abilities.description: At the start of the Combat phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the AP.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following unit:
- Grunts
- Super Grunts

enhancement.name: Enhancement1
enhancement.description: Enhances the captain in some way.

abilities.name: Hidden Threats
abilities.description: If an enemy unit targets this unit, subtract 2 from the hit roll.
